title: Taiwan and UK International Partnership towards the advancement and discovery of novel microRNA species and regulatory proteins in stem cell biology.
abstractText: Abstracts are not currently available in GtR for all funded research. This is normally because the abstract was not required at the time of proposal submission, but may be because it included sensitive information such as personal details.
impactText: We have had two exchange visit between the UK and Taiwan had two mini-symposia related to this award which have been very successful in terms of ideas, new collaborations, project ideas and grant applications. Education Cultural,Societal
findingsText: None as of yet as this is a Partnering Award and is still in progress. To early to say. Award is still in progress. Education,Culture, Heritage, Museums and Collections
